title: Stuck with a Game Abandoned screen despite game having ended
body: Myself and the rest of my group have had the "You have left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game." screen show up after out game ended. We lost, the defeat sign showed up and we clicked to go to post match lobby as usual. The stats weren't showing up after a couple of minutes so we chose to skip. After that the screen popped up and has persisted through multiple relogging attempts. Actually attempting to reconnect results in a black screen and nothing loads. Is there anything we should do?

replies.body: It sounds like you guys might be playing from the same area; though, I can't say for sure. The issues you're explaining here, especially the black screen, strongly suggests that your network is having trouble maintaining a connection to our servers.  I recommend you guys go over the [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to tune up your connection and get this fixed up.  Hopefully that will get you guys back together!
I read through the guide and have already tried all these steps previously. It isn't changing anything with regards to this issue however.

Thanks for the follow up friends!  It looks like this was a result of ghost games, meaning the server failed to communicate the end of the match.  There are a few ways to force an update and get this resolved:

- Log out completely then back in
-  Restarting your computer
- Waiting for the server to update on its own, which can take up to 2 hours.

Once the update has kicked in, there may be a delay in updating your game stats and IP earned.  It's a crappy situation, and hopefully you can get back in with the first two steps.
By update the client, do you mean "repair" it?
I believe they just mean the servers will update themselves. There's no need to do anything client-side other than wait it out, if you're resorting to the 3rd option.
That's exactly what I mean!  The server should be automatically updating and communicating when the game ends, and in this case it had a delay in doing that.  Thanks for your understanding.
It ended up being the third step that worked in the end xD Just wanted to thank you for your help. Knowing what the problem was made it a lot less stressful to deal with.
i had my friend look at my history and the game im trying to reconect too isnt listed there so i think your server isnt properly ending games
i have the same issue too, help me !!!

Yep, me and Leogryph were in a game with two other friends. The game has been over for probably 30 minutes now and we're still stuck in limbo. The game think we're in a match and I can't access anything else on the client.

This isnt a connection issue im talking to my friends just fine, im able to load the boards with no issue .  it is appearing to be a game breaking glitch its keeping us connected to games that are over , the black screen that pops up is when we hit reconnect and try to load back in (and i get a message saying "unable to connect to server check your conection and try again " ) i'd like you to not write this off as a "connection issue " 
 P.S. i checked the connection issue page and i didnt find anything helpful for this issue.
